fields.name: Autothrusters
fields.ability: When defending, if you are beyond range 2 or outside the attacker's primary arc, change one of your blank results to an evade.

fields.name: Stealth Device
fields.ability: Increase your agility by 1. If you are hit by an attack, this ability ceases.

fields.name: Expert Handling
fields.ability: When you perform a barrel roll action, remove one enemy target lock from your ship.

fields.name: Whisper
fields.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, gain one Focus token.

fields.name: Elusiveness
fields.ability: When defending, if you are not stressed, the attacker must reroll one hit or crit result.

fields.name: Dark Curse
fields.ability: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend Focus tokens or reroll attack dice.
